entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache manifest.webmanifest in PWA #54953
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect OpenIdConnectConfigurationSerializer Read() method does not parse UseInfoEndpoint correctly #54951
  • More fine grained settings for hot reloading #54949
  • Hot reload doesn't keep state when multiple static files are changed at once #54942
  • Blazor WebAssembly application hosted in IIS does not load until few tries and gives an ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54941
  • restore.cmd not working #54938
  • HttpContext.RequestAborted is not canceled when app is hosted under IIS with hostingModel = OutOfProcess #54936

Closed

  • Bug: Hard reload not triggered when navigating from Interactive page to SSR page via browser back button #54574
    8.0.x
  • "Angular and ASP.NET CORE" default template gives 404 once deployed in IIS #54161
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54934
  • ForwardedHeadersMiddleware isn't setting X-Original-Proto correctly #54904
  • Redis distributed cache does not need to use Lua #54685
  • JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions registration being override by PostConfigureAuthenticationSchemeOptions<TOptions> when calling AddJwtBearer #52641
  • .NET 7/8 SDK breaks .NET Framework compilation #54544
  • Blazor: add a @bind-value:before event #54916
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54908
  • Perf improvement: updates #54933

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Static pages amid global interactivity #54948
    area-blazor
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp testing deps #54947
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54937
    area-blazor

Merged

  • fix: added missing webtransport check before establishing a session #54927
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Force full reload on popstate #54877
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Enable fixed tests. #54917
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution
